trans-unit.source: This article is for an Azure resource created in Resource Manager, which Microsoft recommends over a resource created in Service Management. For an explanation of the advantages of Resource Manager, see <linkText>Azure Compute, Network & Storage Providers under Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title>. To do the same task for a resource created with Azure Service Management, see the following article:
